mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `lemo_cs` WHERE `cs_cate`='event' AND `cs_eventMainBannerState` = 1 ORDER BY `cs_rdate` DESC
SELECT * FROM `lemo_cs` WHERE `cs_cate`='notice' ORDER BY `cs_rdate` DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT a.*, i.`nick` as 'user_nick' FROM `lemo_diary_article` a JOIN `lemo_member_userinfo` i ON a.`user_id` = i.`user_id` ORDER BY `arti_like` DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT a.* FROM( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', a.acc_name, a.province_no, a.accType_no, a.acc_thumbs, a.acc_rate, a.acc_review, a.acc_season, a.acc_state, r.room_price 'room_price', IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY r.room_price, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) desc) 'top', c.rp_offSeason_weekday, c.rp_offSeason_weekend, c.rp_peakSeason_weekday, c.rp_peakSeason_weekend FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id',(r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id WHERE rero.rero_checkOut_date > NOW() AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE r.room_state = 1 ) a JOIN ( SELECT a.`acc_id`, COUNT(*) cnt FROM ( SELECT `acc_id`, `user_id`, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM `lemo_product_reservation` GROUP BY `acc_id`, `user_id` HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ) a GROUP BY a.`acc_id` ) b ON a.a.acc_id = b.acc_id WHERE a.empty_room_stock <>0 AND a.top = 1 AND a.acc_state = 1 ORDER BY b.cnt DESC LIMIT 10

(SELECT a.* FROM( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', a.acc_name, a.province_no, a.accType_no, a.acc_thumbs, a.acc_rate, a.acc_review, a.acc_season, a.acc_state, r.room_price 'room_price', IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY r.room_price, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) desc) 'top', c.rp_offSeason_weekday, c.rp_offSeason_weekend, c.rp_peakSeason_weekday, c.rp_peakSeason_weekend FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id',(r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id WHERE rero.rero_checkOut_date > NOW() AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE r.room_state = 1 ) a WHERE a.empty_room_stock <>0 AND a.top = 1 AND a.acc_state = 1 AND a.acc_review > 100 ORDER BY a.acc_rate DESC LIMIT 10)
